Text: Cash book New rail products please check for spelling grammarIncreased liquidity in the prompt months has brought more players into the spot rail market Traditionally a thin market in the OTC market the coal group is capitalizing on increased interest by introducing several new EOL rail products On the CSX rail line there will be two btu products with different sulfur contents pound or compliance and pound The CSX contract will be FOB rail in the Big Sandy or Kanawha rail districts On the Norfolk Southern rail line there will be two similiar btu products however FOB rail in the Thacker or Kenova rail districts The coal group intends to bring these products on line within a week for the cash book and hopefully extend them to the forward markets
